thread.title: Dr. Ferrier appointed president of Journalism That Matters (Ohio University)

author: wn.com
title: Dr. Ferrier appointed president of Journalism That Matters (Ohio University)
text: ( Source : Ohio University ) ATHENS, Ohio (Oct. 12, 2015 )-The Journalism That Matters ( JTM ) board elected Dr. Michelle Ferrier, associate dean for innovation, research/creative activity and graduate studies at the Scripps College of
